name: Moonlight Stalker
description:
This game was made for the Spring UE4 Gamejam!

You are in a misty town, surrounded by 15 people. You are secretly a werewolf and you have to kill everyone in that town, seeing them ragdoll in the air after smacking them with giant claws. You have short burst of "Fury Mode" where you turn into a werewolf and go berserk. If you get caught it will make everything more challenging. If  Civilians see you in Fury Mode they will run away alerting any Guard that's close by. Guards have Crossbows that have pure silver arrowheads that will kill you even when in Human Mode. 

*Note! This is my very first game! Credits are on a text file inside the folder.*
